memories.text: that time we found 1k and felt like instant millionaires (for a minute)(captain morgan spiced rum slaps tho)
speaking of captain morgan.. do you remember when i went to remove my makeup and you fell asleep in 5 minutes before i even came back
that time you ate my chocolate!! i still want my raisin chocolate!!!
i cant think of memories bro we're literally too lazy we just cuddle and exist and laugh at people
that time you said i look like mujahideen
the fact that you never pushed me to do anything and always respected me
you pretending to be a chef and adding way too much salt to potatoes
when you called me a boy
the time i hit my head on ur hip bone
the first time you said i love you
the fact that you said 'you worry me sometimes' like 3 days after we met
those days we spent doing absolutely nothing but being together
